description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Slay Those Pixels is a singleplayer 2D Action Adventure Platformer with small elements of character development.  You can choose to play as either a Warrior or a Wizard. In three different worlds, you will slay enemies, level up, find treasure, and face challenging bosses!
description.short: Slay Those Pixels is a singleplayer 2D Action Adventure Platformer with small elements of character development.  You can choose to play as either a Warrior or a Wizard. In three different worlds, you will slay enemies, level up, find treasure, and face challenging bosses!
